Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Christ, love of; Virgin Mary, sorrows of; Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; John the apostle, saint
_description: Love Him wrought — three stanzas with ‘O and I’ refrain (34 lines in all)

BLAdd45896.First Lines: Loue hym wrousteand loue hym brouste…
BLAdd45896.Last Lines:
…Tace v bituux and sey aueþat broust ous out of
                    waWit an on and an I Marie blessed þou beAnd so þe grette
                    gabriel wen he wes sent to þe
BLAdd45896.Editions:
Smith,  A. H. 
             “The Middle English Lyrics in Additional MS 45896.” 
             London Medieval Studies
         2, Part (1951): 33-49: 47-8.
